.heatinline[GruplanmamÄ±ÅŸ veriler iÃ§in aritmetik ortalama;]

<br>

$\mu=\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{N} x_{i}}{N}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}+x_{3}...+x_{N}}{N}$

<br>

--

>YÄ±ÄŸÄ±n gÃ¶zlem sayÄ±sÄ± iÃ§in N, Ã¶rneklem gÃ¶zlem sayÄ±sÄ± iÃ§in n kullanÄ±lÄ±r.

<br>

--

$\bar{x}=\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_{i}}{n}=\frac{x_{1}+x_{2}+x_{3}...+x_{n}}{n}$

<br>

---

.heatinline[GruplanmÄ±ÅŸ veriler iÃ§in aritmetik ortalama;]
